serverConfig: {"mcpServers":{"gitlab-mcp":{"command":"uvx","args":["--from","iflow-mcp-adit-999-gitlab-mcp-server","gitlab-mcp","--transport","stdio"],"env":{"GITLAB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN":"${GITLAB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN}","GITLAB_API_URL":"${GITLAB_API_URL}"},"values":{"GITLAB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN":{"type":"string","title":"GitLab Personal Access Token","description":"GitLab个人访问令牌，用于API认证。获取方式：在GitLab用户设置中创建Personal Access Token，需要api权限","default":""},"GITLAB_API_URL":{"type":"string","description":"GitLab API基础URL，例如：https://gitlab.com 或自托管的GitLab实例URL","default":"https://gitlab.com"}}}}}
